title: Lynda-iPhone Photography from Shooting to Storytelling
description:
iPhone Photography, from Shooting to Storytelling with Richard Koci Hernandez 

1h 45m Appropriate for all Feb 21, 2012

In this course, Richard Koci Hernandez celebrates the art of iPhoneographyÃ¢â‚¬â€how to shoot, enhance, and share photos with an Apple iPhone. The course covers an actual iPhone photo shoot and includes details on how to select and edit photos using a variety of iOS apps and how to interact with the vibrant iPhone photo community by sharing photos using the popular Instagram app. In a bonus chapter, Koci and a lineup of iPhone photography enthusiasts and journalists meet at the 1197 conference in San Francisco to discuss shooting techniques, photo-enhancement tips, and inspiration in the art of photographic storytelling.
Topics include:

    iPhone shooting techniques and tips
    Using apps to get the look you want
    Combining apps to refine your photos
    Telling a story with images
    Sharing photos on Instagram
